required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Addition of Self-compassion Skills Training to a Behavioral Weight Loss Program Delivered Using Video Conferencing Software
clinical_study.official_title: The Addition of Self-compassion Skills Training to a Behavioral Weight Loss Program Delivered Using Video Conferencing Software

brief_summary.textblock: The current study examined the efficacy, feasibility, and acceptability of: 1) adding self-compassion (SC) skills training to a standard behavioral weight loss program (BWLP), and 2) utilizing video conferencing software to deliver small group, weekly, weight loss classes.

detailed_description.textblock:
Object: The current study examined the efficacy, feasibility, and acceptability of: 1) adding self-compassion (SC) skills training to a standard behavioral weight loss program (BWLP), and 2) utilizing video conferencing software to deliver small group, weekly, weight loss classes.
Method: The BWLP program utilized Webex video conferencing software to deliver a 12-week, interactive, small group, weekly weight loss intervention. Participants were randomized to a standard BWLP or a standard behavioral weight loss program augmented with self-compassion skills training (BWLP+SC).

secondary_outcome.description: Change in self-compassion scale score from pre to post
Change in eating behaviors scale from pre to post

arm_group.description: A 12 week small group weight loss intervention delivered via video teleconference technology.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard weight loss plus self-compassion skills training
arm_group.description: A 12 week small group weight loss intervention delivered via video teleconference technology.

intervention.description: A 12 week small group weight loss program delivered via teleconference video technology
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard weight loss plus self-compassion skills training

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 or older, at a BMI of 27 kg/m2 or greater, and available to attend weekly online groups
Exclusion Criteria:
-
